alert.note: Alert for Allen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 2:27PM EST until March 10 at 11:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...In Indiana, Allen IN County. In Ohio, Paulding and Putnam Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 11 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Early precipitation types likely occur as rain before a mix with and changeover to snow around or shortly after midnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution if traveling in wintry conditions.
